Activity.Name: Open/Save Document
Activity.ToolTip: Open Local Word Document / New Word Document and Save / Save As

Activity.Name: Write Text
Activity.ToolTip: Write text at the current Word document cursor position

Activity.Name: Line feed/page break
Activity.ToolTip: In the current Word document cursor position carriage return line / new page

Activity.Name: Write File
Activity.ToolTip: Write the entire contents of the existing local Word document to the current Word document cursor

Activity.Name: Bookmark/Hyperlink/Picture
Activity.ToolTip: Insert a bookmark/hyperlink/picture at the current Word document cursor position

Activity.Name: Backspace
Activity.ToolTip: Backspace deletion at the current Word document cursor position N times

Activity.Name: Copy and Paste
Activity.ToolTip: Copy: Copy the selected content to the pasteboard, usually with the 'Cursor Move' function. Paste: Write the pasteboard content to the current Word document cursor position.

Activity.Name: Select All
Activity.ToolTip: Set the entire contents of the Word document to the selected state

Activity.Name: Get Document Content
Activity.ToolTip: Get all the text in a Word document

Activity.Name: Move up and down, left and right
Activity.ToolTip: The current Word document cursor moves up and down and selects whether the content is selected.

Activity.Name: Moving column items
Activity.ToolTip: Contains cursor movement to the beginning/end/next page of the document

Activity.Name: Font and page properties
Activity.ToolTip: Set the font format/page margin/page alignment of the selected text of the current document

Activity.Name: Open/Save
Activity.ToolTip: Open a local Excel document or create a new Excel new document and save/save as a new path

Activity.Name: Open/Delete Worksheet
Activity.ToolTip: Open a workbook in the currently active Excel document

Activity.Name: New Worksheet
Activity.ToolTip: Create a new workbook in the current Excel document

Activity.Name: Rename Worksheet
Activity.ToolTip: Rename an existing workbook in the current Excel document

Activity.Name: Get Worksheets Name
Activity.ToolTip: Get a list of all worksheet names

Activity.Name: Merge Cells
Activity.ToolTip: Specify a cell range for cell merge operations

Activity.Name: Read Cell
Activity.ToolTip: Get the text content of the specified location cell

Activity.Name: Write Cell
Activity.ToolTip: Set the text content of the specified location cell

Activity.Name: Copy Rows/Columns
Activity.ToolTip: Read a row or column of data

Activity.Name: Paste Rows/Columns
Activity.ToolTip: Copy a row or column of data at a specified position

Activity.Name: Row/Column Operation
Activity.ToolTip: Including hidden/add/delete operations on rows or columns

Activity.Name: Count Rows/Columns
Activity.ToolTip: Get the corresponding total number of corresponding workbook rows / columns.

Activity.Name: Delete Range
Activity.ToolTip: Specify a cell range to delete

Activity.Name: Copy/Paste
Activity.ToolTip: The data of the selected area is copied to the pasteboard and written to other areas.

Activity.Name: Read Range
Activity.ToolTip: Copy the specified range of cells to the DataTable variable

Activity.Name: Write Range
Activity.ToolTip: Write data from the DataTable variable to the specified area

Activity.Name: Find and replace
Activity.ToolTip: Find the corresponding content of the worksheet and replace it with the specified content

Activity.Name: Invoke VBA
Activity.ToolTip: Specify the VBA script existing in EXCEL to run the parameter and get the return value

Activity.Name: Regional settings
Activity.ToolTip: Text format/row height column width/border/content alignment settings for selected range of cells

Activity.Name: Read CSV
Activity.ToolTip: Read the contents of the CVS file into the DataTable variable

Activity.Name: Write CSV
Activity.ToolTip: The contents of the DataTable variable are written to the specified CVS file.

Activity.Name: Append To CSV
Activity.ToolTip: Append the contents of the DataTable variable to the end of the specified CVS file

Activity.Name: Send SMTP Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Send email using SMTP protocol

Activity.Name: Get POP3 Mail Messages
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve POP3 email from the specified server.

Activity.Name: Get IMAP mail
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve IMAP email from the specified server

Activity.Name: Mobile IMAP mail
Activity.ToolTip: Move IMAP email to the specified folder

Activity.Name: Save Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Save the email to the specified folder. If the folder does not exist, create it. If a folder is not specified, the download will be saved in the project folder. Will overwrite the file with the same name as the message in the specified folder

Activity.Name: Save Attachments
Activity.ToolTip: Save the mail attachment to the specified folder. If the folder does not exist, create it. If a folder is not specified, the download will be saved in the project folder. Will overwrite the file with the same name as the attachment in the specified folder

Activity.Name: Save Picture
Activity.ToolTip: Save the mail picture to the specified folder. If the folder does not exist, create it. Will overwrite the image with the same name as the attachment in the specified folder

Activity.Name: Get Outlook Mail Messages
Activity.ToolTip: Get email from Outlook

Activity.Name: Move Outlook Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Move Outlook emails to the specified folder

Activity.Name: Reply To Outlook Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Reply to email from Outlook

Activity.Name: Send Outlook Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Send an email from Outlook

Activity.Name: Save Outlook Attachments
Activity.ToolTip: Save attachments to Outlook emails

Activity.Name: Delete Outlook Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Delete the specified Outlook email and put it in the deleted mail directory. If it is already in the deleted mail directory, delete it completely.

Activity.Name: Archive Outlook Mail Message
Activity.ToolTip: Archive Outlook emails

Activity.Name: Clear Outlook Cache
Activity.ToolTip: Clear cached information for Outlook emails

Activity.Name: Connection
Activity.ToolTip: Connect to the database using a standard connection string

Activity.Name: Close the connection
Activity.ToolTip: Close the connection to the database

Activity.Name: Perform a resultless query(Execute Non Qurery)
Activity.ToolTip: Execute a non-query statement on the database. For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. For all other types of statements, the return value is -1

Activity.Name: Execute Query
Activity.ToolTip: Execute a query against the database and return the results of the query

Activity.Name: Insert statement (Insert)
Activity.ToolTip: Execute a query against the database and return the results of the query

Activity.Name: Execute transaction(Transaction)
Activity.ToolTip:
A sequence connected to a database and having multiple transactions with the database. If UseTransaction is set to true, the contained operations will be performed in a single transaction, and if there are no failures, they will be applied last.
If UseTransaction is set to false, all operations are committed individually. At the end of this activity, the connection to the database will be closed. This activity returns the DatabaseConnection variable

Activity.Name: FTP session
Activity.ToolTip: The parent window that implements the FTP connection and the process run

Activity.Name: Whether the directory exists
Activity.ToolTip: Check if a directory exists on the FTP server.

Activity.Name: Whether the file exists
Activity.ToolTip: Check if the specified file exists on the FTP server.

Activity.Name: Delete
Activity.ToolTip: Delete files or folders in the specified location

Activity.Name: Document dowload
Activity.ToolTip: FTP server to download files on the specified directory

Activity.Name: Upload files
Activity.ToolTip: Upload local files to an FTP server

Activity.Name: Enumerate objects
Activity.ToolTip: Enumeration object
